data.name: locale_rejectionBody
data.value:
The server received the request to synchronize the data, however it rejected it due to an error {0}. The changes the server attempted to process were:

{1}

The message has been quarantined, you can view the message in the sync centre.

Visit Sync Centre

data.name: locale_sync

data.name: locale_syncErrorBody
data.value:
Error synchronizing data with remote server. This is usually caused by a conflict where this device tried to send an object ({1}) to the server but the server had a different version of that object.

For your reference, the error is:
{0}

data.name: locale_syncErrorSubject
data.value: Error sending object to the server

data.name: locale_welcomeMessageBody
data.value:
Your application has been installed successfully. The application is currently downloading remote data it needs to operate from the back-end system (known as the IMS). During this time, you may notice the application operates very slowly or some screens don't have data. That is normal until the synchronizing is complete. We'll let you know when the synchronization operation is done!
Sincerely, - SanteDB Community
